alert.note: Alert for Kohala; Kona; Molokai North; Molokai West; Molokai Windward; Oahu North Shore; Waianae Coast (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued December 02 at 3:39PM HST until December 03 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI AND NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI AND WEST FACING SHORES OF BIG ISLAND THROUGH 6 AM SATURDAY... .The current large, long period west northwest swell (300-310 degrees) will continue to slowly subside through tonight. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Surf 14 to 18 feet for north facing shores and 8 to 12 feet west- facing of Oahu and Molokai. Surf 6 to 8 feet along west facing shores of Big Island. * WHERE...North and west facing shores of Oahu and Molokai. West- facing shores of Big Island. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.

area.areaDesc: Kohala; Kona; Molokai North; Molokai West; Molokai Windward; Oahu North Shore; Waianae Coast
